Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: Generally banned for healthcare practitioners, including dentists, osteopathic physicians, physicians, podiatrists, certified registered nurses, and anesthetists. 
Nevada

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: Banned for hourly employees
Notice requirement: n ying compliant with labor laws, Homebase HR Pro provides live access to certified experts who can guide you through any questions you may have.Non-compete agreement law changes by state 2026NevadaThe Nevada Unfair Trade Practices Act went into effect October 1, 2021.
